summary.span: 指定打印页的边距尺寸。

span.span: Specifies the dimensions of the margins of a printed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于操作和中的边距宽度 。The class is used to manipulate the width of margins in and . 此类的类型说明符。 is the type descriptor for this class. 、 、 和 是定义边距的属性。, , , and are properties that define the margins. 创建相同的 。 creates an identical . 确定另一个对象是否具有与相同的维度 。 determines if another object has the same dimensions as a . 有关打印的详细信息，请参阅 命名空间概述。For more information about printing, see the namespace overview. ## Examples 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下面的代码示例将文档的默认页面设置设置为每一端的边距为1英寸。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins of 1 inch on each side. [!code-cpp[Classic Margins Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Margins Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Margins Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置下边距（以百分之一英寸为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.

value.span: 下边距，以百分之一英寸为单位。

span.span: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按毫米度量边距，请将所需的边距宽度乘以3.937，以以百分之一英寸为单位确定正确的度量值。If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch. 例如，如果需要25mm 的边距，则乘以3.937，结果为98（如果向下舍入）。For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down. 然后，将相应成员设置 为98。You would then set the appropriate member to 98. ## Examples 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下面的代码示例将文档的默认页面设置设置为1英寸的左右边距，宽度为1.5 英寸。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width. [!code-cpp[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按毫米度量边距，请将所需的边距宽度乘以3.937，以以百分之一英寸为单位确定正确的度量值。If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch. 例如，如果需要25mm 的边距，则乘以3.937，结果为98（如果向下舍入）。For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down. 然后，将相应成员设置 为98。You would then set the appropriate member to 98. ## Examples 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下面的代码示例将文档的默认页面设置设置为1英寸的左右边距，宽度为1.5 英寸。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width.
